improvementSuggestions.message: High volume of code style violations (285 total)
improvementSuggestions.action: Implement systematic approach to reduce code style violations

ruleBasedSuggestions.message: High volume of code style violations detected
ruleBasedSuggestions.suggestion: Implement automated code formatting with Prettier/ESLint
ruleBasedSuggestions.action: Configure IDE with code style rules and enable auto-format on save

ruleBasedSuggestions.suggestion: Implement secrets management with environment variables
ruleBasedSuggestions.action: Replace all hardcoded secrets with environment variables and use .env files
